Subinterfaces of BindRequest in org.opends.sdk.requests
 interface GenericBindRequest
          A generic Bind request which should be used for unsupported authentication methods.
 interface SimpleBindRequest
          The simple authentication method of the Bind Operation provides three authentication mechanisms: An anonymous authentication mechanism, in which both the name (the bind DN) and password are zero length.
